update.caption: Yet Another (remote) Process Monitor 2.3.0
update.description:
2.3.0 is a major release which makes YAPM only require .Net 2.0 (does not need .Net 3.5 anymore).
CHANGES FROM 2.2.1
*NEW / Improvements - YAPM does not require .Net Framework 3.5 anymore (.Net 2.0 is enough) - Request #2869164 : Added 'Company' information column for processes
* Bug fixes - Somes minor bugs
